MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH4 postcode area of Edinburgh affecting customers on Telford Road and surrounding streets. Engineers have started excavations to make repairs to an underground cable fault near to Crewe Road South and we still expect all power to be restored by 10:00pm. We understand that to be without power is frustrating and we apologise for this. We will update this message if this information changes. Thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:55pm on 21st January 2021..
